<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106216</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106216</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204439</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Biome basics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biome Grundlagen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fondations de Biome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípios de Biome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principi fondamentali di Biome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Biome βασικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fundamentos de Biome</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This project involves the creation of a simple, yet effective display of the different biomes found on earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Projekt bezieht die Kreation einer 
einfachen, dennoch wirkungsvollen Bildschirmanzeige der 
unterschiedlichen biomes mit ein, die auf Masse gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce projet comporte la création d'un affichage 
simple, pourtant pertinent des différents biomes trouvés sur terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este projeto envolve a criação de um indicador 
simples, contudo eficaz dos biomes diferentes encontrados na terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo progetto comporta la creazione di una 
visualizzazione semplice, tuttavia efficace dei biomes differenti 
trovati su terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το πρόγραμμα περιλαμβάνει τη δημιουργία μιας 
απλής, όμως αποτελεσματικής παρουσίασης διαφορετικά biomes που
βρίσκονται στη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este proyecto implica la creación de una 
visualización simple, con todo eficaz de los diversos biomes 
encontrados en la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:B. CARL RUSH
FN:B. CARL RUSH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
